adrFormatAddress: 505 Greenwich St, New York, NY 10013-1380, USA

originalText.text: I had a recent appointment with Michael for neck pain I’ve been experiencing. He was very thorough and took plenty of time to listen to my health history and concerns. He helped me develop a targeted plan to improve strength and stability in key areas as well as better understand the source of my pain in the first place. I highly recommend Michael and the VERB practice to anyone in search of a knowledgeable and considerate PT.

originalText.text:
I worked with Michael at this clinic and he was outstanding. As someone who has seen multiple PTs in the past, I can confidently say that this was one of my best experiences to date.

From the moment I stepped into the clinic, Michael exuded terrific energy and professionalism. His ability to listen attentively and understand my concerns set him apart right from the start. I felt genuinely heard, which immediately put me at ease and created a sense of trust.

His expertise and attention to detail were evident throughout the assessment and the recovery exercises, which made me very happy with the whole session.

Overall, he surpassed all my expectations and I am grateful to have found such a remarkable PT here!

originalText.text: I recently had an appointment with Michael for workout programming and pain management from a long-term injury. Working with Verb was a great experience; booking the appointment was seamless and the space is beautiful and clean. Walking into the office you can tell they run a very professional operation and take their time with their clients seriously. I came in a bit nervous but Michael began the appointment with a 15 minute consultation and asked detailed questions to make sure he understood my goals. During the appointment, I felt comfortable and in very safe hands. Michael is extremely knowledgeable, patient and took the time to answer my questions throughout our appointment. He also diligently explained and educated me on why I'm experiencing pain and how to pay better attention to my movement outside of workouts. At Verb they also record videos for you to take home of your doing the movements with voiceovers to make sure you remember the proper cues (such an added bonus!). I didn't know that PT could be this detailed of an experience! All of that is to say that I would definitely recommend Verb Physical Therapy.

originalText.text:
Would sincerely recommend!

I suffer from chronic back pain in two areas. My upper back pain is completely different from my lower back pain, both on my right side. Michael was very detailed in his questioning to determine the source of the issues, thorough in the physical tests, and very targeted in his hands on assessment. He built a strong in office and at home plan that would strengthen targeted areas, of which would improve my pain points.

He was also nice enough to voice over some of the techniques so I could follow along at home!

As an athlete, I felt confident in his knowledge to understand the effects gymnastics had on my body, specifically my back. All of his suggestions confirmed what I am feeling in terms of my strengths and weaknesses. Michael explained how even though I am “globally strong, and have a wide range of mobility, that the areas around the pain paints require pin point stability building.” And this made all the sense to me…plus he was successful in breaking everything down for me.

As a women, I felt comfortable through Michael’s professionalism and guidance in my first appointment. Additionally, the facility itself provided a great ambiance, and was super clean!

Going to post this review on ZocDoc as well, so others can benefit from Michael Helgesen! Can’t wait for round two!!

originalText.text: Kyle’s deep knowledge is apparent the moment he takes a look at your mobility. He was able to pinpoint and diagnose my knee pain with startling accuracy and efficiency. I left our appointment feeling so much less pain and equipped with some useful exercises that teach my muscles how to work more functionally. The experience was educational and uplifting, and I left in such a good mood. Kyle’s good energy is contagious and I know I could talk to him for hours and still have more to learn. Thank you Dr. Flaherty!
